Definition: Total length of stay in inpatient rehab unit until discharge

Variable: Days from injury to rehab admission
Definition: Number of days from injury to the inpatient rehab admission
Calculated from provided height and weight
Notes: centered at 0 and scaled by st.dev

Definition: Age of patient (years) on the date the SCI occurred
Total score of measures including self care, sphincter control, mobility, locomotion, and eating
Any use of mechanical ventilation used at admission to rehab?

Definition: Was there a spinal fracture and/or dislocation?
Was surgery performed? Includes limited list of relevant surgeries.

The highest point on the spine where normal sensory and motor function can be identified at admission to rehab
